edu.cs495.engine.gfx.obj.filters

Class ColorSwapFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cs495.engine.gfx.obj.filters.AbstractFilter
      • edu.cs495.engine.gfx.obj.filters.ColorSwapFilter

  • public class ColorSwapFilter
extends AbstractFilter
    A color replacement filter will change several colors to other colors.
    Version:
    February 2019
    Author:
    Spencer

    • Method Detail

      • addColorSwap

        public void addColorSwap(int beforeRgb,
                         int afterRgb)
        Adds a color swap key,value pair which does not allow duplicates. Values passed must be RGB and not contain alpha. There is no parameter checking and values are assumed to be correct.
        Parameters:
        beforeRgb - - an RGB color swap key
        afterRgb - - an RGB color swap value

      • removeColorSwap

        public void removeColorSwap(int rgb)
        Removes a color swap key,value pair
        Parameters:
        rgb - - The RGB key to remove

      • apply

        public int[] apply()
        Recolor the image using the listed colorSwaps
        Specified by:
        apply in class AbstractFilter
        Returns:
        the filtered pixel data
